hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition via BTC Dominance Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: A 3-day consecutive close of BTC.D above 55.5% while BTC trades above its 20-day EMA ($85,200) triggers a regime shift from NEUTRAL to BULL, with altcoins (SOL, AVAX, GRT) outperforming BTC by 15%+ over the following 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC dominance breakouts from compressed levels during neutral regimes historically signal renewed risk appetite and capital rotation into alts. The 55.5% level represents a key resistance zone from Q4 2024. Low realized volatility reduces false breakout risk.

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/BTC or AVAX/BTC ratio increases by 15% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC.D falls back below 54% within 5 days of entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC.D breaks 55.5% but alt/BTC ratios decline or remain flat over the 10-day window, or BTC immediately reverses below its 20-day EMA.
